com.example.loginscreen

Class ClassCustomGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.example.loginscreen.ClassCustomGrid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class ClassCustomGrid
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    A grid manager for the attendance checkin at the home fragment of the StudentViewActivity.
